title: Bye Bye, Bent-in Brake Hoods: UCI Plans Restrictions on Extreme Position in 2024
content:
Governing body plans to restrict aero-optimized hood and lever angles in 2024 ahead of further regulation in 2025.

Read the full article at Bye Bye, Bent-in Brake Hoods: UCI Plans Restrictions on Extreme Position in 2024 on Velo.
